meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Dial number scale position: pointing at approximately 5, Clock position: 6 o'clock, Degrees: 180° (pointing DOWN), Verification: Hand is pointing DOWN ✓. Dial reading: 180/3600 = 0.050 m³.
